casebody.data:
Grafton,

June 24, 1926. Richardson & Cameron Co., Incorporated, v. Herbert Lahout. Henry A. Dodge and Edgar M. Bowker, for the plaintiff. George W. Pike, for the defendant. Per Curiam.

By the terms of the contract the warranty was expressly limited to 400 feet of radiation, and no evidence is reported from which any extension of this warranty could be found.

Exception overruled.
